name: Sophie's List
description:
Sophie is mixing her ingredients to create her christmas gifts.

Collect the items being dropped for Sophie. Some items are heavier than others, so be quick!

Created by Thiago Yasue

Pixel arts based on these "Neopets" arts:

Ultra Golden Nerkmid, Angry Meepit Plushie, Eo Codestone, Meerca Negg Bomb, Sophie Wand, Red Meowclops

Background Music: Forest Theme - D Minor  by Jordan Ottesen
